column1: Anghabar (Iron Delvings; ang "iron" + habar "delved mine") was a mine in the northern part of the Echoriath
column2: or Encircling Mountains of Gondolin. It was Maeglins questing for precious ores in the mountains that led him to discover a rich seam of hard iron in the northern part of the range. From the mine of Anghabar
column3: that iron was extracted and used to increase and improve the arms of Gondolin
column4: ready for the desperate and destructive battles in the closing years of First Age.
